TunableEnum.name: MULTI_UNIT_EVENT_COMMON_AREA_EVENT_BEHAVIOR
TunableEnum.display: Multi Unit Event Common Area Event Behavior
TunableEnum.description: When scheduling a common area event, this is how it is affected by and affects any existing unit events.

Tunable.name: PROPERTY_OWNER_EVENT_TABLE
Tunable.description: The Event Table, represented by this RandomWeightedLoot, will determine and launch the appropriate residential rental event (via drama node loot).

TunableTuple.name: PROPERTY_OWNER_EVENT_TIME_INTERVAL
TunableTuple.description: The min and max possible time (in hours) that the Property Owner event alarm will trigger. A random amount of time between them will be chosen each time alarm is set up.

Tunable.name: lower_bound
Tunable.description: The lower bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: upper_bound
Tunable.description: The upper bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: PROPERTY_OWNER_MAX_ACTIVE_EVENTS
Tunable.description: The maximum number of active events a Property Owner may have at any given time.

Tunable.name: TENANT_EVENT_TABLE
Tunable.description: A RandomWeightLoot event table that will determine and launch a tenant event for the active household's home unit.

TunableTuple.name: TENANT_EVENT_TIME_INTERVAL
TunableTuple.description: Interval in sim hours between attempts to trigger tenant events.

Tunable.name: lower_bound
Tunable.description: The lower bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: upper_bound
Tunable.description: The upper bound of the interval.

TunableList.name: TESTED_UNIT_LOT_TRAITS
TunableList.description: A mapping of ZoneModifiers => Tests, where the ZoneModifiers represent a specific lot condition. The ZoneModifiers will be tested against in the PROPERTY_OWNER_EVENT_TABLE to determine whether an event type can be selected for a unit.

TdescFragTag.name: value
TdescFragTag.description: A series of tests that must pass in order for this ZoneModifier to be applied to a zone.
